title: RoomConnect
summary: Full stack application made in Typescript + Go for Miami students to find compatible students through dynamic queries and a real-time chat.
description:
This project was part of the INIT Build program for the Web Dev 3 group for the Fall '23 cohort. I was in charge of creating the general backend infrastructure, development and production environments, and the real-time chat using WebSockets and Redis.

I had a great time learning about all of the technologies as it was my first time working with them and working with 5 other teammates!

title: Chat App
summary: Chat App made using ReactJS, Express.js, Socket.io, and MongoDB to communicate with other in real-time users eliminating the anonimity barrier by using Google Auth 2.0!
description: This personal project was my first project using WebSockets. I had a lot of fun and it is heavily inspired by Discord/Slack by also having workspaces and channels as well as a message delivery system!

title: Autolog
summary: Full stack application made using the PERN stack for tech savvy autoshop owners to migrate from pen and paper to a basic yet complete inventory in the cloud.
description:
This project was my final project for my internship at Workday x CodePath. It includes many advanced features such as: creation of invoices, members, graphs, inventories, roles and even processing of invoices' PDF's for customers.

This was my biggest project in 2022 and I am very proud of it as I went from design + wireframe, developing the infrastructure of the frontend and backend to deploying it along two more team members.

title: Student Store
summary: Mock Student store featuring receipts, items, cost calculation and search queries through different categories in the store!
description: This was one of my first React projects and had a lot of fun creating tons of features in the span of 3 days! This was part of my internship at CodePath x Workday
